Close Overview Get Directions View On Larger Map Company Name FUMA Lounge Visit Website https://www.fumalounge.com Online Social Profiles Phone Number 407-479-9842 Location 5281 W Irlo Bronson Memorial Hwy Kissimmee , Florida , 34746 United States About FUMA Lounge FUMA Lounge is the perfect venue for any intimate concert/event, offering luxury seating and an amazing atmosphere. While larger venues cater to thousands, our space is ideal for gatherings of up to 400 people. We specialize in Arab concerts and events, but also host a variety of private events and non-Arab concerts, making us a versatile choice for any occasion in Orlando, FL. × Map View Get Directions Cancel FEATURED LISTINGS! FUMA Lounge | Kissimmee Venue | PartySlate Skip to content Venues Planners Vendors Ideas Venues Planners Vendors Ideas FUMA Lounge Find Venues / Florida / Kissimmee / FUMA Lounge Photo credit: FUMA FUMA Lounge 5281 W Irlo Bronson Memorial Hwy, Kissimmee, FL 34746, USA Max Seated 250 Max Standing 300 Request info Favorite Overview Gallery 1 About FUMA Lounge We are a 5000 square feet lounge with comfortable seating, two bars, stage and a private room. Over 150 parking spaces available. We host baby showers, bridal showers, birthdays, anniversaries, bachelorette/bachelor parties, engagement parties, corporate outings and more. Pricing Packages Pricing Info We’re more than just a venue. 
When you rent our space, you have access to 4,000 square feet of fully furnished space, featuring a stage with a backdrop, multiple screens throughout the lounge, professional sound and lighting, and a private room. 

  > > >  Beyond the space itself, we can provide a full open bar, a coffee/tea/dessert bar, and catering service if desired. We can also offer entertainment options.

What’s included really depends on the type and scale of your event, as well as your specific needs. We host everything from small private gatherings to large corporate events, concerts, and other public events. Request a Quote FAQs 5 Does the venue have a liquor license? Yes, we do. We’re a fully licensed lounge with a full bar, offering a wide selection of cocktails, beer, wine, and bottle service. Does your venue have on-site parking available for guests? We have plenty of free parking available to easily accommodate all of your guests / attendies. What is the venue capacity? Our venue can easily host up to 250 guests with full seating, or up to 300 guests with a partially seated setup. What is included in the venue rental cost? What’s included really depends on the type of event you’re planning. For a full buyout, you have access to 4,000 square feet furnished space, complete with a stage, backdrop, multiple screens throughout the lounge, and a private room. From there, we can tailor the experience to your needs. How much does it cost to rent the venue? As a fully operating lounge, pricing varies based on the type and scale of your event, as well as the services you’d like included. We provide a detailed quote once we understand the specifics of your event. Map 5281 W Irlo Bronson Memorial Hwy, Kissimmee, FL 34746, USA Follow Us Visit Website Call Get the latest trends Our team's top picks and more straight to your inbox. While emails and messages left via Live Chat are not monitored after-hours, we will do our best to respond promptly the following business day.
